name: Jerk Seasoning
description: A rub is a dry spice or spice and herb mixture used to coat the meat before grilling, adding not only strong flavor but a bit more crunch, especially if you toast, mix and grind the spices yourself.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg pieces (crack a whole nutmeg with a hammer)
2 teaspoons minced ginger (or 2 teaspoons ground ginger)

recipeInstructions.text: Put allspice, nutmeg, peppercorns and thyme in a spice or coffee grinder and grind to a fine powder.
Mix in remaining ingredients and use immediately. To use later, omit garlic and ginger and store in a tightly covered container; add garlic and ginger immediately before using.
